mapper.sql: O.ORG_ID, O.NAME, O.TYPE, O.PARENT_ID, O.LAYER, O.DESCRIPTION, O.CREATE_USER, O.CREATE_TIME, O.EDITOR_USER, O.EDIT_TIME, O.DELETED, O.PROVINCE, O.CITY, O.ADDRESS, O.MOBILE, O.PHONE, O.LEGAL_NAME, O.ID_CARD, O.POST, O.EMAIL, O.SALESMAN, O.CHECK_USER, O.STATUS, O.CHECK_DESC, O.IS_CHECK_ORG, O.IS_DIR, O.CLEAR_MAC, OCL.CARDHOLDER, OCL.OPENING_BANK, OCL.BRANCHES_BANK, OCL.BBANK_PROVINCE, OCL.BBANK_CITY, OCL.BANK_CARD, OCL.FEE_RATE, OCL.CLEAR_FEE, OCL.MIN_FEE, OCL.MAX_FEE, OCL.BRANCHES_BANKCODE, OCO.CCODE, OCO.CON_STARTDATE, OCO.CON_ENDDATE, OCO.AGENCY_FEE, OCO.PAY_TYPE, OCO.SECURITY_MONEY, OCO.INITIAL_FEE, OCO.MONTHLY_INVOICES, OCO.FEE_DIRECTIONS, OCO.DESCRIPTION, OO.NAME AS PARENTNAME

O.ORG_ID, O.NAME, O.TYPE, O.PARENT_ID, O.LAYER, O.DESCRIPTION, O.CREATE_USER, O.CREATE_TIME, O.EDITOR_USER, O.EDIT_TIME, O.DELETED, O.PROVINCE, O.CITY, O.ADDRESS, O.MOBILE, O.PHONE, O.LEGAL_NAME, O.ID_CARD, O.POST, O.EMAIL, O.SALESMAN, O.CHECK_USER, O.STATUS, O.CHECK_DESC, O.IS_CHECK_ORG, O.IS_DIR, O.CLEAR_MAC, OO.NAME AS PARENTNAME

if.test: orgContract != null and orgContract.ccode != null and orgContract.ccode != ''

mapper.select:
select
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID where O.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SQC_PMS_ORGANIZATION.NEXTVAL AS ORGID FROM DUAL

mapper.update:
UPDATE ORGANIZATION
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAYER = #{layer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDITOR_USER = #{editorUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDIT_TIME = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALESMAN = #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_USER = #{checkUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECK_DESC = #{checkDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CHECK_ORG = #{isCheckOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DIR = #{isDir,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLEAR_MAC = #{clearMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE ORGANIZATION
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAYER = #{layer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDITOR_USER = #{editorUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDIT_TIME = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_NAME = #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALESMAN = #{salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_USER = #{checkUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECK_DESC = #{checkDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CHECK_ORG = #{isCheckOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DIR = #{isDir,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLEAR_MAC = #{clearMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORG_CLEANING OCL ON OCL.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ORG_CONTRACT OCO ON OCO.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID WHERE O.TYPE=0 AND O.STATUS=1 AND O.DELETED=0 ORDER BY O.LAYER ASC

SELECT
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID

SELECT
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID WHERE O.TYPE=0 AND O.STATUS=1 AND O.DELETED=0 ORDER BY O.LAYER ASC

SELECT
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID WHERE O.PARENT_ID = #{value} AND O.STATUS=1 AND O.DELETED=0 ORDER BY O.LAYER ASC

SELECT
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN org_Contract OCO ON OCO.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID
ORDER BY O.ORG_ID ASC

SELECT O.ORG_ID, O.NAME, O.TYPE, O.PARENT_ID, O.LAYER, O.DESCRIPTION, O.CREATE_USER, O.CREATE_TIME, O.EDITOR_USER, O.EDIT_TIME, O.DELETED, O.PROVINCE, O.CITY, O.ADDRESS, O.MOBILE, O.PHONE, O.LEGAL_NAME, O.ID_CARD, O.POST, O.EMAIL, O.SALESMAN, O.CHECK_USER, O.STATUS, O.CHECK_DESC, O.IS_CHECK_ORG, O.IS_DIR, O.CLEAR_MAC, OCL.BANK_CARD,OCL.CARDHOLDER,OCL.Opening_Bank,OCL.BRANCHES_BANK,OCL.BBANK_PROVINCE,OCL.BBANK_CITY, OO.NAME AS PARENTNAME from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN org_Contract OCO ON OCO.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ORG_CLEANING OCL ON OCL.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID
ORDER BY O.ORG_ID ASC

SELECT
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID
ORDER BY O.ORG_ID ASC
select count(1) from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID

select
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID
ORDER BY O.ORG_ID ASC

select
from ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN org_Contract OCO ON OCO.ORG_ID = OO.ORG_ID

SELECT O.ORG_ID, O.NAME, O.TYPE, O.PARENT_ID, O.LAYER, O.DESCRIPTION, O.CREATE_USER, O.CREATE_TIME, O.EDITOR_USER, O.EDIT_TIME, O.DELETED, O.PROVINCE, O.CITY, O.ADDRESS, O.MOBILE, O.PHONE, O.LEGAL_NAME, O.ID_CARD, O.POST, O.EMAIL, O.SALESMAN, O.CHECK_USER, O.STATUS, O.CHECK_DESC, O.IS_CHECK_ORG, O.IS_DIR, O.CLEAR_MAC, OCL.CARDHOLDER, OCL.OPENING_BANK, OCL.BRANCHES_BANK, OCL.BBANK_PROVINCE, OCL.BBANK_CITY, OCL.BANK_CARD, OCL.FEE_RATE, OCL.CLEAR_FEE, OCL.MIN_FEE, OCL.MAX_FEE, OCL.BRANCHES_BANKCODE, OCO.CCODE, OCO.CON_STARTDATE, OCO.CON_ENDDATE, OCO.AGENCY_FEE, OCO.PAY_TYPE, OCO.SECURITY_MONEY, OCO.INITIAL_FEE, OCO.MONTHLY_INVOICES, OCO.FEE_DIRECTIONS, OCO.DESCRIPTION FROM ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORG_CLEANING OCL ON OCL.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ORG_CONTRACT OCO ON OCO.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID WHERE O.ORG_ID = #{id} AND O.STATUS = 1 AND O.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY O.ORG_ID ASC

SELECT
FROM ORGANIZATION O LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION OO ON OO.ORG_ID = O.PARENT_ID
AND REVERSE(O.LAYER) LIKE REVERSE('${startLayer}%')
AND ${endLayer}
